thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 40 4
thread.title: Henning

author: Henning
title: Henning
text:
I ordered a multimeter, it arrived (fastly) with one very loose probe, the other one was good. The probe had 0.4Ohms resistance in comparison to a very cheap one from another multimeter. So current measurement would be dangerous. I explained the problem and provided a picture that clearly showed the crooked cutout of the probe. The support wanted a video, which I provided, then the support wanted another explanation. After some messages they said this is was working as intended and there is nothing I can do.
I was hoping they would resend me a probe, since the original one cost 8€ + shipping from the official distributor, but they did not. So I went for 2.50€ probes from Aliexpress out of my own pocket and after 4 weeks I finally had a working multimeter.
I guess I am lucky I did not order an expensive phone or similar.
